name: 美琴
text:
……うん、そう
今レッスン室に向かっているところ
trans:
...Mm, right.
I'm heading over to the lesson space right now.

name: 美琴
text:
書店に少し寄って……うん
そんなにはかからないと思うの
trans:
I was stopping by the bookstore on my way... Mm.
I don't think it will take very long.

name: 美琴
text:
……そうだね、そのくらいには着くかな
アタマで打ち合わせ……了解
trans:
...That sounds right, I should arrive around then.
A preparatory meeting before we begin? Got it.

name: 美琴
text:
今日はひとり？
……ああ、ふたりで予約入ってるんだ
trans:
Will I be practicing alone today?
...Yeah, I booked the space for two people.

name: 美琴
text: うん、よろしくね
trans: Mm, I'll see you then.

name: 美琴
text: ────メンデルスゾーン
trans: ────Mendelssohn.

name: にちか
text: あーあーあーあーあー……
trans: Ah, Ah, Ah, Ah, Ahhh...

name: にちか
text:
あーあー……
────あっ、お疲れ様です！
trans:
Ah, Ah...
────Oh, good afternoon!

name: 美琴
text:
お疲れ様
……早いね
trans:
Good afternoon.
...You're here early.

name: にちか
text:
はい！　アタマで打ち合わせ入るって聞いたので
レッスン時間削れちゃうなって思って──
trans:
Yes! Since I heard there was going to be a meeting at
the start of our lesson, I thought I would try and
make up for that lost time...

name: にちか
text:
────あっ、ピアノ使ってください！
私、あっちでストレッチしてますから
trans:
────Oh, please, play the piano if you want!
I'll just be starting on my stretches over there.

name: 美琴
text:
……そう？
でも、私もストレッチから入ろうかな
trans:
...Oh?
Actually, I was planning on getting started on my
stretches as well.

name: にちか
text: あっ、はい！
trans: Oh, alright then!

name: 美琴
trans:
────
*inhale*... *exhale*...

name: にちか
trans:
────
*inhale*... *exhale*...

name: にちか＆美琴
text: すー……はー…………
trans: *inhale*... *exhale*...

name: プロデューサー
text:
──お疲れ、ふたりとも
急に悪いな
trans:
──Good afternoon to you both.
I apologize for the sudden meeting.

name: にちか＆美琴
text: お疲れ様です
trans: Good afternoon.

name: 美琴
text: どうしたの？
trans: What's happened?

name: プロデューサー
text:
ちょっと嬉しい話が決まったからさ
すぐに知らせたくって
trans:
I found out some good news, see.
I wanted to share it with you two immediately.

name: プロデューサー
text: まぁ、座ってくれ────
trans: Well, why don't you both take a seat────

name: 多人数の息
text: すーー……はーー…………
trans: *inhale*... *exhale*...

name: 美琴
text:
うん、ストレッチは十分だね
少しずつ体を温めていこうか
trans:
Mm, I think that's enough stretches for now. 
Let's begin on warming up, then.

name: ダンサー
text: オッケー！
trans: Okay!

name: ダンサーたち
text: はーい！
trans: Yeah!

name: にちか
text: ば、バックダンサーさん……ですか！
trans: W-we're getting... back-up dancers!?

name: プロデューサー
text:
そう！　ふたりの後ろについてくれるんだ
次のフェスで！
trans:
That's right! They'll be dancing behind you at your
music festival performance!

name: 美琴
text: それじゃ、基礎のセットから
trans: How about we start with some foundation routines.

name: 美琴
text:
へえ……
豪華なステージになりそう
trans:
Oh my...
This performance is looking to be quite extravagant.

name: プロデューサー
text:
美琴とやったことのあるダンサーさんも
いらっしゃるみたいだぞ
trans:
It sounds like one of the dancers is actually someone
you've worked with before, Mikoto.

name: 美琴
text:
そうなの？
誰だろう
trans:
Really?
I wonder who it could be.

name: 知人ダンサー
text:
美琴ー
合わせる前にちょっと打ち合わせ、いい？
trans:
Mikoto!
Before practice, do you mind if we talk for a sec?

name: 美琴
text:
もちろん
もしかしてサビのところ？
trans:
Absolutely.
Let me guess, is it about the chorus?

name: 知人ダンサー
text:
そうー！　さっすが美琴
あのね────
trans:
That's right! You always get it, Mikoto.
See, I was thinking────

name: プロデューサー
text:
舞台監督さんは
ぜひって言ってくれてるんだけど、どうかな
trans:
The stage director was all for it, but I want to know
what the two of you think.

name: 美琴
text:
断る理由なんてないんじゃない？
面白いと思うけど
trans:
Is there any reason to refuse?
I think it will add a lot to the performance.

name: にちか
text:
……っ
は、はい……！　すごいですね……
trans:
...Nh.
Y-yes...! It'll be amazing...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
おお
にちかも問題ないか？
trans:
I see.
So you don't have any issues with it either, Nichika?

name: ダンサー１
text: ──この前の現場、めっちゃきつくってー！
trans:
──The performance I worked before this was sooo
harsh!

name: ダンサー２
text:
あー、ドームだっけ！　やばかったんでしょー？
あたしも声掛かってたんだけど、他あったから──
trans:
Oh, was that at the arena? I sure bet it was!
They tried to recruit me for it, but I was already
scheduled for something.

name: にちか
text:
……っ
問題ないですよ……全然！
trans:
...Nh.
Yes, no issues... at all!

name: 美琴
text:
だけど、全体的に振りの調整が必要になるんじゃない？
そのあたりはどうなるの？
trans:
Although, now all the chorography will need to be
adjusted, won't it?
Are there any plans on how to handle that?

name: プロデューサー
text:
うん、基本的には先生が考えてくださるよ
ただ……
trans:
Yeah, the dance trainer will be figuring that out.
However...

name: プロデューサー
text:
そんなには時間がないから、
ダンサーチーム含めて、みんなで協力してもらいたい
trans:
Since there isn't a whole lot of time, I'd like to start
including the dance team in your lessons, so you can
all support and learn from each other.

name: ダンサー３
text:
緋田さんて、アップの指示も的確だしさぁ
ここの現場すっごいやりやすそう
trans:
Aketa-san is always so precise, even when she's
just leading our warm-ups. This performance
seems like it'll be a breeze.

name: ダンサー４
text:
わかるわかる
タレントさんがダンスわかってるの、ほんといいよね
trans:
I know right?
It's nice when the talent actually know a thing or
two about dance.

name: ダンストレーナー
text: はーい、ダンサーチーム集まってー！
trans: Alright. Dance team, places please!

name: ダンサーたち
text: あ、はーい────
trans: Oh, comiiing────

name: プロデューサー
text:
いいダンサーさんを集めてくれるらしいから
舞台が盛り上がるだけじゃなくて、刺激にもなると思う
trans:
It seems like we've got a strong group of dancers.
So I'm hoping that not only will they add to the
performance, but also that they'll motivate you.

name: プロデューサー
text: 気合いを入れて、練習していこうな
trans:
I want the two of you to feel fired up and ready to
practice.

name: にちか＆美琴
text: はい……
trans: Yes...

name: 知人ダンサー
text:
──私たちの方でもう少し動きをつけるのはどう？
フェッテみたいなのとか────こういうの
trans:
Is alright if we added in some extra choreo for just
us dancers? Maybe like a fouette, or so.
────Something like this.

name: 美琴
text:
いいと思う
全然問題ないよ
trans:
It sounds good to me.
I see no issue at all.

name: にちか
text:
……
水飲もう
trans:
...
I should drink some water.

name: 美琴
text:
──
ううん、これだと遅れる……
trans:
──
No, this would make it too slow...

name: にちか
text:
……うわー、やっばー！
こんなんでテレビ出ちゃうとかほんと終わってるよねー！
trans:
...Sheesh, what a mess!
If they're letting a third-rate act like this appear on
TV, then idols are doomed!

name: はづき
text:
ん～
そう……？
trans:
Hmmm～
You think so...?

name: にちか
text:
めっちゃめちゃ最悪じゃん、このユニット！
盆踊りじゃない？
trans:
This unit is just absolutely awful, aren't they!
C'mon, this isn't a local festival, shouldn't you
dance better than that?

name: にちか
text: 日本人って、ダンスが根本的にダメなのかなー
trans:
I dunno, maybe Japanese people are just inherently
bad dancers.

name: にちか
text:
でも、可愛いもんねー
メンバー超仲いいし！
trans:
But sure, they're adorable. I'll give them that.
And the members get along really well!

name: にちか
text: そういうのみんな好きだもんなー！
trans: That's the stuff people like to see, isn't it!

name: にちか
text:
──あっ、ちょっとお姉ちゃん……！
勝手にチャンネル変えるのやめてよ……！
trans:
──Wait, Hazuki, what was that...!
Don't suddenly change the channel...!

name: はづき
text:
……んー？
嫌なんじゃないの～？
trans:
...Oh, huh?
It seemed like you hated watching them, though～?

name: にちか
text: い、嫌っていうか────！
trans: T-that's not quite────!

name: 美琴
text:
…………
イントロからの動線を変えて────
trans:
...
If we changed the flow from the intro────

name: にちか
text: こんなレベルでいいんだー、みたいな……！
trans: It's more like, "so the bar is really this low", y'know...!

name: にちか
text:
後ろついてるダンサーさんもかわいそうだよねー
現場大変なんだろうなぁー……！
trans:
You gotta feel bad for those back-up dancers.
Bet it's hard on them, having to dance with such
third-rate performers...!

name: 美琴
text: もう一回観て────
trans: Let me review that again────

name: レッスン場スタッフ
text:
すみませーん……！
次のご予約の方来られてるので────
trans:
I'm sorry to interrupt...!
But the next group coming in has arrived────

name: 美琴
text:
────あ……時間……
すぐに出ます
trans:
────Oh... It's time to go...
I'll move out of here immediately.

name: にちか
trans: ...Guh.

name: にちか
text:
あははっ
お姉ちゃんにはわかんないかー！
trans:
Ahaha.
I guess you just wouldn't get it, Hazuki!

name: にちか
text:
こういうの好きな人たちにはちょっと難しいかもねー
私たちの求めてるレベルって！
trans:
For people who like that kind of stuff, the high level
performances SHHis are going for are probably a bit
too advanced.

name: にちか
trans: ...Guh.

name: ダンサー３
text: 緋田さん、アップの指示も的確だしさぁ
trans:
Aketa-san is always so precise, even when she's
just leading our warm-ups.

name: ダンサー２
text: あー、ドームだっけ！
trans: Oh, was that at the arena?

name: プロデューサー
text: いいダンサーさんを集めてくれるらしいから
trans: It seems like we've got a strong group of dancers.

name: 美琴
text:
────
また鳴ってる
trans:
────
It's being played again.

name: 子ども
text:
ママ！
あのピアノ誰も弾いてないのに動いてるー！
trans:
Mama! Look, that piano is making music even though
no one is playing it!

name: 美琴
text: 自動演奏……かな
trans: A self-playing piano... perhaps?

name: off
text: ブラボー……！
trans: Bravooo...!

name: off
text: 本当に上手ねぇ……
trans: She certainly is skilled...

name: off
text:
レッスン生の中じゃ一番じゃないかしら
──あら、お辞儀も可愛いわ
trans:
She might just be the best out of all the students.
──Oh my, and look at that darling little bow.

name: 美琴
trans: ────Heheh.

name: 美琴
text: 上手ね
trans: How skilled.

name: にちか
text:
こういうの好きな人たちにはちょっと難しいかもねー
私たちの求めてるレベルって！
trans:
For people who like that kind of stuff, the high level
performances SHHis are going for are probably a bit
too advanced.

name: にちか
text:
……っ
高いのは────
trans:
...Guh.
The only one's that are high level────

name: にちか
text: 美琴さんと、ダンサーさんのレベル…………！
trans: Are Mikoto-san and the dancers...!

name: にちか
text:
……
やばい……
trans: ...This is getting bad...

name: 美琴
text:
……今日は歌もダンスもないし
この時間に準備できるものがないから
trans:
...Since we won't be singing or dancing today, it's not
like this time can be used to prepare for anything.

name: にちか
text:
やばい……
……
trans: This is getting really bad...

name: にちか
text: いいかげん終わるから……
trans: It's going to be over before I know it...

name: にちか
text: こんな……ラッキーな時間
trans: This phase where I can still get by... with sheer luck.
